item.title: Demi-Slugs
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Pavatri /päˈvät.ri/ Sarvaran: Peváca /peˈʋá.t̠͡ʃa/ Stonechild Imperial: Fevázh /feˈʋáʒ/

item.title: Minikin
item.description: Minikin, native to The 2nd Realm, have tails, fairly long yet anthropoid digitigrade feet, and small snouts. It is said that the rest of their features were modified by Lwubo, the deity of love and fertility, to be anthropoid in shape.
